com.cutterapi.text

Class NGrammList

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cutterapi.text.NGrammList

  • public class NGrammList
extends java.lang.Object
    This Object stores a list of Strings especially NGramms and connects an Integer with them (typically their quantity in a text, sentence or string)
    Author:
    Phil Niehus

    • Constructor Detail

      • NGrammList

        public NGrammList(java.util.List<java.lang.String> ngramm,
                  java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> cnt)
           throws java.lang.Exception
        Parameters:
        ngramm - A list containing different Strings
        cnt - A list containing integers connected to strings (if "hello" should be 215, index 0 of ngramm should be "hello" and index 0 of cnt should be 215)
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • addItem

        public void addItem(java.lang.String item,
                    int value)
        Adds an entry to the NGrammList
        Parameters:

        value - the value for the added item

      • addTo

        public void addTo(java.lang.String item)
           throws java.lang.Exception
        Adds 1 to the value of the given Index
        Parameters:
        item - The value of this item will be increased by 1
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Throws an Exception if the selected item was not found.

      • setItemValue

        public void setItemValue(java.lang.String item,
                         int value)
                  throws java.lang.Exception
        This methods changes the value of a selected item. The first matching item is selected if the NGrammList contains duplicated items.
        Parameters:
        item - The value of this item will be changed to the given value
        value -
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Throws an Exception if the selected item doesn't exist.
